div.p: The Constable and the Lord of Saint André are in Orléans in France, along with other lords, to negotiate a peace. However, the Constable has promised for 200,000 crowns and the Lord of Saint André for 5,000 crowns, etc. The plague is not raging in the camps, as was reported, but a certain contagious fever has spread throughout the entire army.
To be delivered to the postmaster in Zurich.
